lead_paragraph: The foiling of the package plot was a sobering reminder that quick response to timely intelligence rules the day.

headline.main: Bomb Plot Shows Key Role Played by Intelligence
headline.print_headline: Quick Response To Intelligence Foiled Bombers

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI, ROBERT F. WORTH and ERIC LIPTON
